biotools.summary: ProTargetMiner as a proteome signature library of anticancer molecules for functional discovery. Automated online software for anticancer drug target/mechanism deconvolution. . ProTargetMiner is also available directly through this web page: http://protargetminer.genexplain.com. The ProTargetMiner R Shiny package is an automated online software for anticancer drug target mechanism deconvolution
